summary: This is a retooled version of Sorex Vinius to look more appealing for the ladies (or lads :D) out there.
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys. I am a long time lurker on the Nexus and after being relatively disappointed by what was available for the husband characters out there, I finally decided to do it myself. I am not a modder by any means, but I was happy enough with my results and I thought I\'d share it with others who might be looking for the same. 

I have only changed Sorex\'s appearance. The only mod that is required is Apachii\'s SkyHair for males. To make things simple I used only vanilla eyes and resources. The ENB used in the screenshot (simple for now, I just spawned him and took a quick one) is UNBLEAK by Trustinall and can be found here (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828).
author: Nyctipolus
